column4: I botched an update and a lot of things are skewed up. How do I open terminal from within nautilus? I'm just looking for its executable so I can run apt-get install Ubuntu desktop and retry the update that way.
Unfortunately not. Things are really screwed up. Even the graphics for the login screen were pretty.....wrong.
just press CTRL+ALT+T and you get a terminal
there is a command list in the ubuntu docs
